titleStmt.title: The trew report of the dysputacyon had [and] bego[n]ne in the conuocacyo[n] hows at london among the clargye there assembled the xviij. daye of October in the yeare of our lord M.D.LIIII.
titleStmt.author: Philpot, John, 1516-1555.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Alexander Edmonds [i.e. Jan Gheylliaert and Steven Mierdman?,

notesStmt.note: The imprint, from colophon, is false; actual place of publication supplied and printers' names conjectured by STC.
The meeting was actually held in 1553.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
